changelog.item: The custom filter for releases can now filter out irrelevant downloaded files at the same time.
Added sorting by the time a repository is starred.

Adjusted repository search: currently, entering a keyword triggers real-time repository name matching, while clicking AI Search will retrieve AI-analyzed content, tags, etc., speeding up search. Natural language search is temporarily disabled due to unsatisfactory results.
Add a check for updates feature
Improved AI analysis failure indicators and added a retry button for failed items
